mapper.select:
select
from e_user where company like #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and memtype=2 order by id limit #{firstResult,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{maxResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from e_user where memtypesign=#{sign,jdbcType=INTEGER} and memtype=2
and line like concat(concat('%',#{town1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'→%')
and line like concat(concat('%',#{city1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'→%')
and line like concat(concat('%→%',#{town2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and line like concat(concat('%→%',#{city2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
order by id limit #{firstResult,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{maxResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: select u.id as id,u.realname as realName,u.headimage as headPic, u.local_city as locationCity, u.local_latitude as latitude,u.local_lontitude as lontitude, c.carlong as carLong,c.carno as carNo,c.cartype as carType from e_user u,ku_carowner c where memtype=#{memType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and u.id=c.userid order by id limit #{firstResult,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{maxResult,jdbcType=INTEGER}
